p.s: In scene 3 of Disgraced, Scene 3 by Ayad Akhtar the story gets to its highest point.
Jory and Isaac are at Amir's and Emily's appartmentapartment for dinner.
Jory and Amir are coming back from somewhere but Jory is the first person to enter the room and catches Isaac and Emily having a very intimate moment.
Amir enters the room, full of anger and screaming at Jory about not telling him about the promotion in their job.
Jory asks Isaac if they having an affair while Amir keeps asking what's going on because he entered after Jory.
A discussion starts between Jory, Isaac and Emily.
Jory insists that she saw them kissing while Isaac and Emily keep denying it by explaining that Isaac was consoling her because of the promotion Amir didn't get.
But Jory does not believe them and keeps confronting them by asking why they were kissing and if they having an affair.
Amir turns to Jory and blames for ruining his life (marriage, job).
Jory does not react to it and gets herself ready to leave but Amir keeps on shouting and blaming at her and even calls her by the n-word or rather himself.
After that Isaac tries to talk to Emily but she don'tdoesn't want to talk with him.
Amir calls Isaac an asshole which concludes into a heated conversation with the end that Amir spits in Isaac's face.
Because of that Isaac says that there is a reason that people like Amir are called animals and walks out.
Amir asks Jory to leave what she does, after telling Amir that Mort is retiring and she will get his caseload and explains why he didn't get it.
After that Amir checks if Jory's guess was right while Emily goes in the kitchen to get him a coffee.
After Emily comes back from the kitchen Amir confronts her with Isaac and whatswhat's going on between them.
Emily finally says the truth that they had an affair at the art show but she was drunk and blames herself and feels disgusted.
But all of a sudden, Amir hits Emily multiple times in the face until her face looks bloody.
After that he suddenly realizes what he has done and is shocked.
